list.name: Changes
list.comment:
migrate to PostgreSQL with SQLModel and modernize ORM structure
- Transitioned from MongoDB/`pydantic-db-backend` to PostgreSQL/SQLModel for improved performance, scalability, and ACID compliance. - Added `sqlmodel`, `psycopg2-binary`, and configured database connection pooling and session management. - Introduced new data models: `EventixTask`, `EventixEvent`, `EventixEventTrigger`, and `EventixSchedule`. - Added converters for seamless transition between Pydantic and SQLModel types. - Updated task execution logic, backend initialization, and routing to align with new architecture. - Wrote migration documentation and changelog for guidance and details on breaking changes.

for tests.client.test_routers.test_route_event_post.executor": "Run", "Python tests.pytest for tests.functions.test_event.test_trigger_restore_from_json.executor": "Debug", "Python tests.pytest for "evntix-client-router-bug", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "/home/mba/svnwork/lsoft-oss/eventix", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", task.summary: change log level in set_base_url and bump version to 4.0.3
change log level in task_worker and bump version to 4.0.4
add coding guidelines document to .aiassistant directory
add coding guidelines document to .aiassistant directory
remove debug print statement in `event.py`, skip failing test with marker
remove debug print statement in `event.py`, skip failing test with marker
refactor: apply consistent formatting across test and core files, update dependencies, and add `ruff`

feat: implement namespace listing in API and add related tests
- Introduced `list_namespaces` function for retrieving distinct namespaces. - Integrated `/namespaces` route into FastAPI with the new functionality. - Added unit tests for `list_namespaces` and `/namespaces` API endpoint. - Updated project files for dependencies and SDK adjustments.

feat: add support for default task priority in `task` decorator and include tests
- Added `default_priority` parameter to the `task` decorator for specifying default priorities. - Updated task execution to use the default priority if no priority is explicitly set. - Introduced comprehensive tests to validate default priority behavior.
bump version to 4.2.0 in project files

chore: update project dependencies and configuration
- Added new dependencies to `uv.lock` for `cffi`, `cryptography`, `keyring`, `pycparser`, `secretstorage`, and others. - Updated `pyproject.toml` to add `keyring` support and included `keyring-provider` for `subprocess`. - Introduced `setenv.sh` for environment variable configuration. - Adjusted formatting in `pyproject.toml` for consistency.

bump version to 4.3.0, add HTTP health check middleware, and update dependencies
- Added middleware function to prioritize `/healthz` route using `Response` from FastAPI. - Removed `/healthz` route from `default.py` router. - Updated `uv.lock` and `pyproject.toml` to reflect dependency changes for `keyring`.

refactor: streamline Dockerfile for better efficiency and update dependencies
- Replaced `arg`-based setup with a direct `python:3.13-slim` base image. - Simplified system dependencies installation and updated commands for `uv` usage. - Removed Poetry configuration and replaced it with `uv` dependency management. - Updated `.dockerignore`, `.env.local.example`, and `pyproject.toml` for consistency. - Added `docker_run.py` for streamlined Docker execution.

bump version to 4.3.1, update event execution logic, and re-enable skipped test
- Updated `TEventixEventTrigger.execute_code` to improve task extraction and handle missing return values with an exception. - Re-enabled `test_trigger_restore_from_json` by removing `@pytest.mark.skip` and restoring debug output. - Updated `uv.lock` and `pyproject.toml` to reflect the version bump to 4.3.1.

refactor: improve code formatting, update documentation, and streamline execution commands
- Enhanced `TEventixEventTrigger.execute_code` for better readability and exception handling. - Updated `README.md` with detailed installation, architecture, and usage information. - Simplified Docker run command in `docker_run.py`. - Added minor formatting adjustments across multiple files for consistency.

bump version to 4.4.0, update dependencies, and add support for `alembic` migrations
- Added `alembic` (v1.17.2) and its dependencies (`mako`, `sqlalchemy`, `typing-extensions`, `markupsafe`) to `uv.lock`. - Introduced `psycopg2-binary` (v2.9.11) and `sqlmodel` (v0.0.22) to support database interactions. - Updated `eventix` package dependencies in `uv.lock` to include `alembic`, `psycopg2-binary`, and `sqlmodel`. - Removed unused dependency `pydantic-db-backend`. - Adjusted metadata and dependency specifications in `uv.lock` for consistency.

bump version to 4.3.2, update event trigger logging, and improve directory config loading
- Updated `uv.lock` and `pyproject.toml` to reflect the version bump to 4.3.2. - Enhanced event trigger logging to include `namespace` and `event_name` for improved traceability. - Added log messages for trigger configuration loading from YAML files.

migrate to PostgreSQL with SQLModel and modernize ORM structure
- Transitioned from MongoDB/`pydantic-db-backend` to PostgreSQL/SQLModel for improved performance, scalability, and ACID compliance. - Added `sqlmodel`, `psycopg2-binary`, and configured database connection pooling and session management. - Introduced new data models: `EventixTask`, `EventixEvent`, `EventixEventTrigger`, and `EventixSchedule`. - Added converters for seamless transition between Pydantic and SQLModel types. - Updated task execution logic, backend initialization, and routing to align with new architecture. - Wrote migration documentation and changelog for guidance and details on breaking changes.

- Added new dependencies to `uv.lock` for `cffi`, `cryptography`, `keyring`, `pycparser`, `secretstorage`, and others. - Updated `pyproject.toml` to add `keyring` support and included `keyring-provider` for `subprocess`. - Introduced `setenv.sh` for environment variable configuration. - Adjusted formatting in `pyproject.toml` for consistency.

- Added middleware function to prioritize `/healthz` route using `Response` from FastAPI. - Removed `/healthz` route from `default.py` router. - Updated `uv.lock` and `pyproject.toml` to reflect dependency changes for `keyring`.

refactor: streamline Dockerfile for better efficiency and update dependencies
- Replaced `arg`-based setup with a direct `python:3.13-slim` base image. - Simplified system dependencies installation and updated commands for `uv` usage. - Removed Poetry configuration and replaced it with `uv` dependency management. - Updated `.dockerignore`, `.env.local.example`, and `pyproject.toml` for consistency. - Added `docker_run.py` for streamlined Docker execution.

bump version to 4.3.1, update event execution logic, and re-enable skipped test

bump version to 4.4.0, update dependencies, and add support for `alembic` migrations
- Added `alembic` (v1.17.2) and its dependencies (`mako`, `sqlalchemy`, `typing-extensions`, `markupsafe`) to `uv.lock`. - Introduced `psycopg2-binary` (v2.9.11) and `sqlmodel` (v0.0.22) to support database interactions. - Updated `eventix` package dependencies in `uv.lock` to include `alembic`, `psycopg2-binary`, and `sqlmodel`. - Removed unused dependency `pydantic-db-backend`. - Adjusted metadata and dependency specifications in `uv.lock` for consistency.

bump version to 4.3.2, update event trigger logging, and improve directory config loading
- Updated `uv.lock` and `pyproject.toml` to reflect the version bump to 4.3.2. - Enhanced event trigger logging to include `namespace` and `event_name` for improved traceability. - Added log messages for trigger configuration loading from YAML files.

migrate to PostgreSQL with SQLModel and modernize ORM structure
- Transitioned from MongoDB/`pydantic-db-backend` to PostgreSQL/SQLModel for improved performance, scalability, and ACID compliance. - Added `sqlmodel`, `psycopg2-binary`, and configured database connection pooling and session management. - Introduced new data models: `EventixTask`, `EventixEvent`, `EventixEventTrigger`, and `EventixSchedule`. - Added converters for seamless transition between Pydantic and SQLModel types. - Updated task execution logic, backend initialization, and routing to align with new architecture. - Wrote migration documentation and changelog for guidance and details on breaking changes.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
migrate to PostgreSQL with SQLModel and modernize ORM structure
- Transitioned from MongoDB/`pydantic-db-backend` to PostgreSQL/SQLModel for improved performance, scalability, and ACID compliance. - Added `sqlmodel`, `psycopg2-binary`, and configured database connection pooling and session management. - Introduced new data models: `EventixTask`, `EventixEvent`, `EventixEventTrigger`, and `EventixSchedule`. - Added converters for seamless transition between Pydantic and SQLModel types. - Updated task execution logic, backend initialization, and routing to align with new architecture. - Wrote migration documentation and changelog for guidance and details on breaking changes.
